title: Bug 114905: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value in the list box of the report parameter is not retained after modifying it.
EB: The default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter after modifying it.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter configuration.
2. Set a default value for the list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes.
5. Verify the default value in the list box.
